title: What do the lyrics to the song 'This Is The Way' mean? - Quora

response.answer_text: I assume, “this is the way" song mean you and your partner (your wife or your girlfriend) giving love each other, this song actually prove your love is going stronger each time both of you fight the terrible situations. You are the last journey of finding love, and the beginning of loving partner, you may the chosen one and only one for your partner. This song has deep lyrics. I like that
